name: Restaurant Scheduling Software
short_description: Before the staff at ShiftZen became software developers, each and every individual in the ShiftZen staff spent part of their professions in the restaurant market; either serving, bartending, hosting, kitchen and/or management. We fully understand the restaurant business and we are focused on continually adding additional features, tools and improvements to ShiftZen and preserving our costs low. ShiftZen combines the staffing necessities of your business with your employees' diverse needs and availability. Restaurant owners and managers can finally dispense with the resource drain that comprises weekly restaurant staff scheduling.
